titleInfo.title: Letter to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter reports developments from Schiras [Shiraz] including news that Carim Caun [Karim Khan] is resigned to losing Bussora [Basra]to the Turks and seems resolved to leave it in ruins. Other administrative matters are also discussed.An additional note on 27 March explains that the letter has been sent on an express boat to Muscat not via Congoon.
